00015 #ifdef SELF
00016 #    error SELF already defined
00017 #endif
00018 #define SELF (*static_cast<T*>(this))
00019 #define CONST_SELF (*static_cast<const T*>(this))
00020 
00021 //class Vector2;
00022 //class Vector3;
00023 //class Vector4;
00024 template <typename T, int N>
00025 class VectorBase {
00026 public:
00027     VectorBase();
00028     VectorBase(const T &v);
00029     VectorBase(const Real *v);
00030 //    VectorBase(const Vector2 &rhs);
00031 //    VectorBase(const Vector3 &rhs);
00032 //    VectorBase(const Vector4 &rhs);
00033     
00034     //Functions
00035     void clear(Real clearVal = 0);
00036     
00037     Real length() const;
00038     Real lengthSquared() const;
00039     bool isUnitVectorBase() const;
00040     Real dotProduct(const T &rhs) const;
00041     Real radiansBetween(const T &rhs) const;
00042     Real degreesBetween(const T &rhs) const;
00043     bool hasSameDirectionAs(const T &rhs) const;
00044

00047     T getNormalized() const;
00048     T getClamped(Real lower, Real upper) const;
00049     T getJittered(Real maxVariance) const;

00051     T getFacingForward(const T &rhs) const;
00052

00054     T getInterpolated(const T &endValue, Real percent) const;
00055     T getReflected(const T &normal, Real restitution = 1.0f) const;
00056 
00057     //Self modifiers

00059     Real normalize();
00060     void clamp(Real lower, Real upper);
00061     void jitter(Real maxVariance);
00062     void jitter(const T &maxVariance);
00063     void faceForward(const T &normal);

00104 //******************************
00105 //******* C'Tors
00106 //******************************
00107 template <typename T, int N>
00108 VectorBase<T, N>::VectorBase() {
00109     memset(&SELF[0], 0, sizeof(Real) * N);
00110 }
00111 
00112 template <typename T, int N>
00113 VectorBase<T, N>::VectorBase(const T &v) {
00114     memcpy(&SELF[0], &v[0], sizeof(Real) * N);
00115 }
00116 
00117 template <typename T, int N>
00118 VectorBase<T, N>::VectorBase(const Real *v) {
00119     memcpy(&SELF[0], v, sizeof(Real) * N);
00120 }

00141 //******************************
00142 //******* Functions
00143 //******************************
00144 template <typename T, int N>
00145 void VectorBase<T, N>::clear(Real clearVal) {
00146     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00147         SELF[i] = clearVal;
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00151 template <typename T, int N>
00152 Real VectorBase<T, N>::length() const {
00153     return Math::Sqrt(lengthSquared());
00154 }
00155 
00156 template <typename T, int N>
00157 Real VectorBase<T, N>::lengthSquared() const {
00158     return dotProduct(CONST_SELF);
00159 }
00160 
00161 template <typename T, int N>
00162 bool VectorBase<T, N>::isUnitVectorBase() const {
00163     return eq(lengthSquared(), 1);
00164 }
00165 
00166 template <typename T, int N>
00167 Real VectorBase<T, N>::dotProduct(const T &rhs) const {
00168     Real result(0);
00169     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00170         result += CONST_SELF[i] * rhs[i];
00171     }
00172 
00173     return result;
00174 }
00175 
00176 template <typename T, int N> //TODO Speed this up!
00177 Real VectorBase<T, N>::radiansBetween(const T &rhs) const {
00178     T a = getNormalized();
00179     T b = rhs.getNormalized();
00180     Real dot = a.dotProduct(b);
00181 
00182     if (dot > 1) { return 0; }
00183     else if (dot < -1) { return Math::PI; }
00184     return Math::Acos(dot);
00185 }
00186 
00187 template <typename T, int N>
00188 Real VectorBase<T, N>::degreesBetween(const T &rhs) const {
00189     return Math::Degrees(radiansBetween(rhs));
00190 }
00191 
00192 template <typename T, int N>
00193 bool VectorBase<T, N>::hasSameDirectionAs(const T &rhs) const {
00194     return Math::eq(radiansBetween(rhs), 0);
00195 }
00196 
00197 //******************************
00198 //******* Const Functions
00199 //******************************
00200 template <typename T, int N>
00201 T VectorBase<T, N>::getAbsolute() const {
00202     T result;
00203     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00204         result[i] = Math::Abs(CONST_SELF[i]);
00205     }
00206 
00207     return result;
00208 }
00209 
00210 template <typename T, int N>
00211 T VectorBase<T, N>::getNormalized() const {
00212     T result(CONST_SELF);
00213     Real oldLength = length();
00214     if (Math::eq(oldLength, 0)) { return result; }
00215     return result /= oldLength;
00216 }
00217 
00218 template <typename T, int N>
00219 T VectorBase<T, N>::getClamped(Real lower, Real upper) const {
00220     T result(CONST_SELF);
00221     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00222         clamp(lower, upper, result[i]);
00223     }
00224 
00225     return result;
00226 }
00227 
00228 template <typename T, int N>
00229 T VectorBase<T, N>::getFacingForward(const T &normal) const {
00230     T result(CONST_SELF);
00231     Real value = dotProduct(normal);
00232     if (Math::lt(value, 0)) { result *= -1; }
00233     return result;
00234 }
00235 
00236 template <typename T, int N>
00237 T VectorBase<T, N>::getJittered(Real maxVariance) const {
00238     T result(CONST_SELF);
00239     if (!maxVariance) { return result; }
00240     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00241         result[i] += (Math::Rand() * maxVariance * 2) - maxVariance;
00242     }
00243 
00244     return result;
00245 }
00246 
00247 template <typename T, int N>
00248 T VectorBase<T, N>::getJittered(const T &rhs) const {
00249     T result(CONST_SELF);
00250     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00251         result[i] += (Math::Rand() * rhs[i] * 2) - rhs[i];
00252     }
00253 
00254     return result;
00255 }
00256 
00257 template <typename T, int N>
00258 T VectorBase<T, N>::getMidpoint(const T &rhs) const {
00259     return getInterpolated(rhs, -.5);
00260 }
00261 
00262 template <typename T, int N>
00263 T VectorBase<T, N>::getInterpolated(const T &rhs, Real percent) const {
00264     //return SELF + ((rhs - SELF) * percent);
00265     T result(CONST_SELF);
00266     result.interpolate(rhs, percent);
00267     return result;
00268 }
00269 
00270 template <typename T, int N>
00271 T VectorBase<T, N>::getReflected(const T &normal, Real restitution) const {
00272     T result(CONST_SELF);
00273     result.reflect(normal, restitution);
00274     return result;
00275 }

00277 //******************************
00278 //******* Self Modifiers
00279 //******************************
00280 template <typename T, int N>
00281 void VectorBase<T, N>::absolute() {
00282     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00283         SELF[i] = Math::Abs(SELF[i]);
00284     }
00285 }
00286 
00287 template <typename T, int N>
00288 Real VectorBase<T, N>::normalize() {
00289     Real oldLength = length();
00290     if (Math::eq(oldLength, 0)) { return 0; }
00291     SELF /= oldLength;
00292     return oldLength;
00293 }
00294 
00295 template <typename T, int N>
00296 void VectorBase<T, N>::clamp(Real lower, Real upper) {
00297     ASSERT(lower < upper);
00298     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00299         if (SELF[i] < lower) { SELF[i] = lower; }
00300         if (SELF[i] > upper) { SELF[i] = upper; }
00301     }
00302 }
00303 
00304 template <typename T, int N>
00305 void VectorBase<T, N>::jitter(Real maxVariance) {
00306     if (!maxVariance) { return; }
00307     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00308         SELF[i] += (Math::Rand() * maxVariance * 2) - maxVariance;
00309     }
00310 }
00311 
00312 template <typename T, int N>
00313 void VectorBase<T, N>::jitter(const T &rhs) {
00314     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00315         SELF[i] += (Math::Rand() * rhs[i] * 2) - rhs[i];
00316     }
00317 }
00318 
00319 template <typename T, int N>
00320 void VectorBase<T, N>::faceForward(const T &normal) {
00321     Real value = dotProduct(normal);
00322     if (Math::lt(value, 0)) { SELF *= -1; }
00323 }
00324 
00325 template <typename T, int N>
00326 void VectorBase<T, N>::makeMidpoint(const T &rhs) {
00327     interpolate(rhs, -.5);
00328 }
00329 
00330 template <typename T, int N>
00331 void VectorBase<T, N>::interpolate(const T &rhs, Real percent) {
00332     //SELF += ((rhs - SELF) * percent);
00333     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00334         SELF[i] += ((rhs[i] - SELF[i]) * percent);
00335     }
00336 }
00337 
00338 template <typename T, int N>
00339 void VectorBase<T, N>::reflect(const T &normal, Real restitution) {
00340     Real length = VectorBase<T, N>::length();
00341     if (Math::eq(length, 0)) { return; }
00342 //    assert(normal.isUnitVectorBase());
00343 
00344     normalize();
00345     SELF -= normal * 2 * dotProduct(normal);
00346     SELF *= length * restitution;
00347 }

00473 template <typename T, int N>
00474 T VectorBase<T, N>::operator-() const {
00475     return SELF * -1;
00476 }

00478 template <typename T, int N>
00479 T& VectorBase<T, N>::operator=(const T &rhs) {
00480     memcpy(SELF[0], rhs[0], sizeof(Real) * N);
00481     return SELF;
00482 }

00484 template <typename T, int N>
00485 bool VectorBase<T, N>::operator==(const T &rhs) const {
00486     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
00487         if (Math::ne(CONST_SELF[i], rhs[i])) {
00488             return false;
00489         }
00490     }    
00491     return true;
00492 }

00496     return  !operator==(rhs);
00497 }
